fields.name: oracle
fields.label: Oracle
fields.description: A tool for reflection and insight, offering intuitive guidance through symbols, nature, or archetypes.

fields.name: tarot
fields.label: Tarot
fields.description: A structured 78-card system used for divination and self-exploration. Divided into the Major and Minor Arcana, each card carries traditional meanings that guide reflection, storytelling, and personal insight.
